events.name: Google Developers Roadshow in April -  Taif (22), Jeddah (24), Medina(25)
events.description:
https://events.withgoogle.com/googledevelopersroadshow/
Seating is limited, so Apply ASAP. https://goo.gl/7gbktz

The Google Developers Roadshow MENA 2018 is a series of interactive conferences, providing the latest updates on Google technologies and open platforms for developers and industry leaders. It will be held throughout the year at various cities in Middle East and North Africa. We're excited to share our thoughts on innovative technologies and encourage developers to build the next big mobile, web, cloud or machine learning solutions.

Come and join us as we travel around MENA.

12:00 to 14:00 - Final round judgement
14:00 to 22:00 - Closing and honoring ceremony

events.name: Techstars: Startup Weekend Jeddah Global Artificial Intelligence Edition

venue.name: Islamic Development Bank
venue.address_1: King Khalid Road, An Nazlah Al Yamaniyyah, Jeddah 22332
venue.address_2: Ø·Ø±ÙŠÙ‚ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ù„Ùƒ Ø®Ø§Ù„Ø¯ØŒ Ø§Ù„Ù†Ø²Ù„Ø© Ø§Ù„ÙŠÙ…Ø§Ù†ÙŠØ©ØŒ Ø¬Ø¯Ø© 22332

events.description:
Shape the future of KSA through entrepreneurship and artificial intelligence!
Techstars Startup Weekends are 54-hour events designed to provide superior experiential education for technical and non-technical entrepreneurs.

Global Startup Weekend AI is a once a year special edition of Techstars Startup Weekend where every event around the world focuses on Artificial Intelligence (AI).

Global Startup Weekend AI is a global initiative to make this vertical event more diverse, inclusive, and impactful by removing barriers. Boosting and connecting communities everywhere to organize their own SWAI and empower their ecosystems to tackle problems using AI.

Over the same 2 weekends, over 15 cities will organize a SWAI in their local community. Everyone will be connected throughout the world, with Global Mentors, facilitators & organizers.

In just 54 hours, participants will form teams, brainstorm, design a product, validate their business idea and pitch in front of experienced judges on Saturday evening. Throughout the weekend, there will be highs and lows, frustrations and moments of triumph, but some people will meet their co-founder at the event, and some teams will even move on to start a company after the event. Win or lose, we are certain that new lessons will be learned, ideas will be tested, limits will be pushed and lives will be changed forever.

To spice things up, we will be having a few special activities: party and warm up games on Thursday night to break the ice and form your teams!! On Friday, we will be inviting awesome mentors and guests down to interact with the teams so please seek their advice and opinions! In the true spirit of Startup Weekend, we will be bringing in local startups, budding founders and cool companies to sponsor, showcase and network with you! Remember, Startup Weekend is a time for experiential learning, networking and building your personal brand!

It is for everyone, whether you are working corporate, building your own startup, having a career as a professional clown, a mechanic, a designer, coder or student, everyone can contribute in their own way. We are open to teams forming before the event, but we strongly recommend you to form your team on Friday night and work on an idea then. Startup Weekend is designed to embrace diversity, creating a conducive environment for anyone to turn their concepts into companies! So give it a go, you'll never know what magic can happen over a weekend!

register link
http://bit.ly/isdbtechstars

if you have any questions regarding it check all the details on the link mentioned above.

we can't wait to see you there:)

events.name: #Flutter Live '18 Viewing Party + Codelab

venue.name: Arab Open University
venue.address_1: Nahdat Ash Sharq, As Salamah, Jeddah 23437

events.description:
And yes! Weâ€™re tuning into the awesome Flutter Live Party all the way from the Science Museum in London! This is the first #Flutter Live Party happening all over Saudi Arabia! Donâ€™t miss this chance to join us to get the latest updates & news from the Flutter Team!
Flutter is Googleâ€™s free and open source SDK that builds high-quality native iOS and Android apps from a single codebase, you heard it right, a single codebase!!

Weâ€™ll be having an additional codelab after the livestream to set the interested people onto their first steps into the Flutterian World. So, go ahead and bring your laptops, but make sure to have Flutter installed on your machines! Welcome to the Dart side â¤!

This event is brought to you with the collaboration of the AI & IT Club of the Arab Open UniversityğŸ¤©!!

It will be a great opportunity to see the livestream together, meet other developers, and engage in tech discussions.

=======================================================================

AGENDA

19:00 Livestream starts
20:00 Keynote starts
21:25 Live Flutter Codelab

=======================================================================

Side note: You need to RSVP for this event to make sure youâ€™re in!

Stay tuned for further updates!

events.name: DevFest onAir 18
events.description:
GDG DevFest 2018 is our annual all-day developer conference that offers speaker sessions across multiple product areas, codelabs, hackathon and more!

Exclusive content.
DevFest OnAir includes exclusive content from Google. Switch between three separate tracks: Cloud; Mobile; Voice, Web & more. Sessions cover multiple products such as Android, Google Cloud Platform, Firebase, Google Assistant, Flutter, machine learning with TensorFlow, and mobile web.

Tailored to your time zone.
Anyone can join, no matter where you are. Weâ€™re hosting three broadcasts around the world, around the clock, so thereâ€™s a convenient time for you to join no matter where you are at home or at work.

Ask us a question live.
Our live Q&A forum will be open throughout the online event to spark conversation and get you the answers you need.

Fun!
Join the fun with interactive trivia during DevFest OnAir where you can receive something special! Every participant will receive one free month of learning on Qwiklabs.

AGENDA:
https://devfest.withgoogle.com/events/devfestonair18/schedule?talk=preshow-emea

The objective of the Study Jams is to increase the technical competence of the members of our community through face-to-face courses.

These trainings give the members of our community a series of skills that can be used for personal and professional development.

events.name: Brand guidelines To Developers

venue.name: biznes cafe
venue.address_1: Prince Sultan Branch Rd, Al Naeem, Jeddah 23526

events.description:
Becoming a software developer isnâ€™t easy. There are ups and downs in the process. Whatâ€™s gotten you through the process? Passion is contagious, so take some time to recognize exactly what makes you passionate about programming or a tech-maker.

We as developers often forget to brand ourselves and our products. Often our clients expect us to provide minimal branding and necessary aesthetics.

Please join us on our presentation and discussion on:

â€œPersonal Branding as a Software Developerâ€.
â€œBranding your Projects and Productsâ€.
â€œCommon mistakes in Brandingâ€.

about speaker
Sadiq Hussain
UI/UX Designer

My Name is Sadiq Hussain. I am a User Interface and User Experience Designer working for Sejel Technology Co. Ltd here in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia. At Sejel I get to design better User Experience for Websites, Mobile Applications, Reports, Infographics and Dashboards.

I feel that we can solve many complex problems and understand business requirement better if we learn how User Experience works. Often people mistake UX designers with Graphic Designers and Front-End Developers. But actually UX helps you create sustainable scalable products online.

I have a diverse experience investigating user goals and workflows through usability testing and user research processes including; use cases, surveys, heuristic evaluations, workshops and contextual inquiry. This has given me a solid knowledge of user interface design, information architecture and Human Computer Interface principles.
